english: When christ says , " blasphemy against the holy spirit , " i don t think anyone , even myself , really understands completely what it would actually take to commit an unforgivable sin , if there were such a thing
chinese: 耶稣说冒渎圣灵会，我想没人明白，连我自己都不很明白。如果有这样不可原谅的罪，那么那些干犯这种罪的人会付出什么代价？

english: Suppose if christ had come , and the people preached falsehoods against him , or blackened his name , or accused him falsely or wrongly , things like that , that s against the holy spirit , because he represented the holy spirit
chinese: 也许在救世主来临时，人们散播不实的谣言毁谤?的名誉诬告? ，诸如此类的事情，这些都是冒渎圣灵，因为耶稣代表圣灵。
